query:
UPDATE vendas 
SET excluido = 1,
    excluidoEm = NOW(),
    motivoExclusao = 'Vendas de teste sem identificação de turma e formando - removidas conforme solicitação do usuário em 07/01/2026'
WHERE id IN (
  SELECT v_id FROM (
    SELECT v.id as v_id
    FROM vendas v 
    LEFT JOIN formandos f ON v.formandoId = f.id
    WHERE v.dataVenda BETWEEN '2026-06-14 00:00:00' AND '2026-06-15 23:59:59'
      AND v.excluido = 0
      AND f.turmaId IS NULL
  ) AS temp
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3WG3DCJNDgKq1ck.d12df11ceaba --database axWmxYbCBHHB5ETKSgA95A --execute UPDATE vendas 
SET excluido = 1,
    excluidoEm = NOW(),
    motivoExclusao = 'Vendas de teste sem identificação de turma e formando - removidas conforme solicitação do usuário em 07/01/2026'
WHERE id IN (
  SELECT v_id FROM (
    SELECT v.id as v_id
    FROM vendas v 
    LEFT JOIN formandos f ON v.formandoId = f.id
    WHERE v.dataVenda BETWEEN '2026-06-14 00:00:00' AND '2026-06-15 23:59:59'
      AND v.excluido = 0
      AND f.turmaId IS NULL
  ) AS temp
)
